name: HH_CPLN_ENC
description:
This table no longer populates data for new HH/HSPC care plans as of the Epic November 2022 release (10.3).





This table contains Home Health overtime single items from the LCP  (care plan) master file.

columns.name: CAREPLAN_ID
columns.description: This column no longer populates data for new HH/HSPC care plans as of the Epic November 2022 release (10.3). Use the CARE_INTG_ID column in the CARE_INTEGRATOR or CAREPLAN_INFO tables to report on this item instead.  Unique identifier for the care plan.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This column no longer populates data for new HH/HSPC care plans as of the Epic November 2022 release (10.3). Use the CONTACT_DATE_REAL column in the CARE_INTEGRATOR or CAREPLAN_CNCT_INFO tables to report on this item instead.  Unique identifier for this contact for this patient.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUMBER
columns.description: This column no longer populates data for new HH/HSPC care plans as of the Epic November 2022 release (10.3). Use the CONTACT_NUMBER column in the CAREPLAN_CNCT_INFO table to report on this item instead.  Contact number linked to the care plan.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: This column no longer populates data for new HH/HSPC care plans as of the Epic November 2022 release (10.3). Use the CONTACT_DATE column in the CAREPLAN_CNCT_INFO or CARE_INTEGRATOR tables to report on this item instead.  The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: This column no longer populates data for new HH/HSPC care plans as of the Epic November 2022 release (10.3). Use the CM_CT_OWNER_ID column in the CARE_INTEGRATOR or CAREPLAN_CNCT_INFO tables to report on this item instead.  The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: This column no longer populates data for new HH/HSPC care plans as of the Epic November 2022 release (10.3). Use the USER_ID column in the CARE_INTEGRATOR table to report on this item instead.  ID of the user who created the contact.  Links to table CLARITY_EMP.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: LAST_EDIT_INST
columns.description: This column no longer populates data for new HH/HSPC care plans as of the Epic November 2022 release (10.3). Use the LAST_EDIT_TIME column in the CARE_INTEGRATOR table to report on this item instead.  Instance at which the care plan was last edited.

columns.name: CTCT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: This column no longer populates data for new HH/HSPC care plans as of the Epic November 2022 release (10.3). Use the CTCT_SERIAL_NUM column in the CAREPLAN_CNCT_INFO table to report on this item instead.  The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.
